# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that its worth might be subjective to you, and I appreciate your interest in exploring this possibility. I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a price of $750000. This offer represents a significant investment on your part, but I believe it also presents a valuable opportunity for both of us. If you're interested in discussing further details or have any questions, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
